sentences.english: And a lot of cooing voiceovers reminding you of all the brilliance on display.
sentences.chinese: 還有很多畫外音不時低語着，提醒你影片的卓越不凡。

sentences.english: It has animated gameplay, voice-overs and realistic casino-style action.
sentences.chinese: 有生動的遊戲，畫外音和現場娛樂場風格。

sentences.english: The sound-over usually be employed as the definition of the imagin.
sentences.chinese: 畫外音經常用於介紹畫面的意義。
